heading: Equipment inspection fees
text:
See Table 28-112.7.4.

                                                                         TABLE 28-112.7.4

          EQUIPMENT INSPECTION TYPE                                                    FILING FEE                                RENEWAL             COMMENTS
                                                                                                                                   FEE
        High-pressure boiler periodic inspection.            $65 for each inspection, for each boiler.
        Reinspection fee following a violation.              As provided by department rules,
        Equipment inspection fee: Each elevator or other     $100 for each inspection, for each device.
         device regulated by this code.
